item.description:
Wires got crossed somehow, and the contact person at The Stoneham Theatre did not return my call.
I did speak with her on Tuesday, and she is making discounted tix. available to members of meetup for "Gaslight" during its final performances this week/weekend.

Tix. are priced at 25.00. You can call Carole Dempsey at the group sales department, tell her you're with meetup, and pay for the tickets of your choice by debit/credit card.
These can be picked up at the will-call window in the lobby before the curtain goes up.

Contact Carole @ 781-279-7885 by Friday 6/11/10 to purchase tickets
for any of the following performances:

- Thursday, 6/10 at 7:30pm

- Friday, 6/11/10 at 8:00pm

- Saturday 6/12/10 at 4:00pm

- Saturday 6/12/10 at 8:00pm

- Sunday 6/13/10 at 2:00pm

http://www.stonehamth...

I myself am not sure yet if I will be going, but please post the day/time of tix. you choose, and I may see you there!
Should you desire to have a meal, snack, dessert, or beverage before or after the play, I suggest the following locales:

The 99 Restaurant in Stoneham is on Rt 28 (Main St) which theatre is located on. Located directly off Rt. 95.

In April, some of us dined at nearby Polcari's Restaurant in Woburn, on Montvale Ave, directly off Rt. 93.

I've been told that the "Felicia's" restaurant in Stoneham is very very good, though you may need reservations on a weekend.

Note: The Stoneham Theatre's next production in "Always Patsy Cline" in the month of July. We will have access to discounted tix for this highly acclaimed production, and a meetup will be scheduled soon.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: "GASLIGHT"- Last minute- discount Theatre tickets (not really a meet-up!)
